docDescription: Dr. Faisal Al-Saud, with 10+ years of experience, specializes in minimally invasive surgery and complex procedures.

about.title: About
about.description: With over a decade of experience in the medical field, Dr. Faisal Al-Saud is a skilled general surgeon known for his expertise in minimally invasive techniques and complex surgeries. He has a deep commitment to patient care and consistently strives to achieve the best outcomes through precision, advanced surgical methods, and compassionate care. His extensive background in both elective and emergency surgeries has earned him a reputation for excellence in the medical community.

cases.title: Highlights of
cases.para: Explore some of the successful medical cases I have handled in renowned hospitals across Saudi Arabia.

case1.title: Minimally Invasive Heart Valve Replacement
case1.desc: A groundbreaking surgery in Riyadh involving minimally invasive techniques for heart valve replacement, performed at King Faisal Specialist Hospital.

case2.title: Advanced Proton Therapy for Cancer
case2.desc: Successfully treated a complex cancer case using advanced proton therapy in Makkah at King Abdullah Medical City.

case3.title: Life-Saving Heart Transplant
case3.desc: A life-saving heart transplant procedure performed with exceptional expertise in Al-Kharj at Prince Sultan Cardiac Center.

case4.title: Rare Pediatric Neurosurgery
case4.desc: Handled a rare pediatric neurosurgery case, showcasing precision and expertise in Jeddah at National Guard Health Affairs.

case5.title: High-Risk Orthopedic Surgery
case5.desc: Managed a high-risk orthopedic surgery, ensuring a quick recovery for the patient, performed at Dr. Soliman Fakeeh Hospital.

experience1.title: King Faisal Specialist Hospital and Research Center
experience1.experience: Worked as a senior surgeon specializing in minimally invasive techniques and complex organ transplants, gaining extensive experience in life-saving procedures over a 5-year tenure.

experience2.title: MOH-King Saud Medical City
experience2.experience: Served as a lead trauma surgeon for over 4 years, managing high-pressure emergency cases and refining expertise in advanced surgical interventions.

experience3.title: Dr. Soliman Fakeeh Hospital
experience3.experience: Contributed as a consultant surgeon for 3 years, excelling in orthopedic and general surgeries with a strong focus on patient recovery and outcome optimization.

review1.para: The surgical team at King Faisal Specialist Hospital provided exceptional care. The procedure was smooth, and the recovery process was faster than I had anticipated. I’m grateful for the professionalism and attention to detail.
review1.name: Ahmed Al-Farsi

review2.para: My experience at Dr. Soliman Fakeeh Hospital was outstanding. The doctors were highly skilled, and the hospital staff made me feel comfortable throughout my treatment. I’m glad I chose this hospital for my surgery.
review2.name: Sara Al-Shammari

review3.para: I had a complex medical issue and received treatment at MOH-King Saud Medical City. The doctors were incredibly knowledgeable, and the recovery process was smooth thanks to their guidance. I highly recommend this hospital.
review3.name: Faisal Al-Mutairi

review4.para: The level of care I received at Dr. Soliman Fakeeh Hospital was amazing. The surgeons and medical staff ensured I was well informed about every step of the process. My recovery was quick, and I couldn’t be more pleased with the results.
review4.name: Layla Al-Dosari

review5.para: King Faisal Specialist Hospital treated me like family. From the moment I walked in, I felt that I was in the hands of experts. The team provided me with excellent care and support throughout the procedure and recovery.
review5.name: Mohammed Al-Jaber

footer.para: This is Dr. Faisal Al-Saud's official website, dedicated to showcasing his expertise, medical services, and professional background.

result.title: Witness The Difference and
result.para: See the transformation! Check out the before and after images showcasing the remarkable improvements and enhancements

video_sec.title: Patient Centered
video_sec.para: Explore firsthand testimonials from our patients celebrating their life-changing outcomes after exceptional surgical care.
